turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, yeah, I want to get some pizzas for later and I want to see if you can help me order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to order from Bella Luna, so I wanted four medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first one I just want jalapenos, on the second one I want spinach and olive, on the third one make that one ground beef and green peppers, and on the last one I want meatballs, but I also want extra sauce on it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that was a bit fast, sorry can you please repeat?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, so the first pizza I want jalapenos, on the second one I want spinach and olives, on the third one I'll have ground beef and green peppers on it and for the last one make that a meat ball pizza with extra sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want thin crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: for all four.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 4 medium pizzas, 1 with jalapeños, the second with spinach and olives. the third with ground beef and green peppers. the fourth is meatballs with extra sauce. thin crust on all 4, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, can you go through it one repeat it back to me one more time?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 4 medium pizzas. 1 with jalapeños, the second with spinach and olives. the third with ground beef and green peppers. the fourth is meatballs with extra sauce. thin crust on all 4.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, it sounds like you have it all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the total is $42.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fair enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bella luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy, bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
